comment: Alternate proof of ~ equsex . This proves the result directly, instead of as a corollary of ~ equsal via ~ equs4 . Note in particular that only existential quantifiers appear in the proof and that the only step requiring ~ ax-13 is ~ ax6e . This proof mimics that of ~ equsal (in particular, note that ~ pm5.32i , ~ exbii , ~ 19.41 , ~ mpbiran correspond respectively to ~ pm5.74i , ~ albii , ~ 19.23 , ~ a1bi ). (Contributed by BJ, 20-Aug-2020.) (Proof modification is discouraged.) (New usage is discouraged.)
